channel.title: Main-pages on Alex Hansen
channel.description: Recent content in Main-pages on Alex Hansen

item.title: Music
item.description: To see my only formally released album, check out our bandcamp page. Instrumental metal. To see my personal demos as they accumulate towards an eventual album, check out my soundcloud. I write mostly metal, but there are some other things interspersed in there as well. If you’re in Seattle/PNW and would like to write this kind of music together, I’m always interested in collaborating. Contact me by sending me an email.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineer who works primarily in Rust. I also make music. I have two cats and enjoy hockey. Some things I’m proud of: I was the second engineer at Osmos, and built out the in-house AI there. I created the Sway Programming Language and cut my compiler chops there. I have many opinions on languages and future languages I want to create, and I’m thankful to Fuel for giving me the chance to make a real compiler for real users.
